#Build a sample program.
#The source files must be available in the <project root> or <project root>/src folder

#Source files for sample
aux_source_directory(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} SAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES_1)
aux_source_directory(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src SAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES_2)
set(ALL_SAMPLE_SOURCES ${SAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES_1} ${SAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES_2})

#Build sample binary
if(PDS_BUILD_SAMPLE)
    if(ALL_SAMPLE_SOURCES)
       find_package(Threads)
       message(STATUS "Developer Studio: Found the following sample sources: ${ALL_SAMPLE_SOURCES}")
       add_executable(${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample ${ALL_SAMPLE_SOURCES})
       if(PDS_BUILD_STATIC_LIBRARY)
           set_target_properties(${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME ${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME})
       else()
           set_target_properties(${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME ${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_dyn)
       endif()
       target_include_directories(${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample PUBLIC "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/include" "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}" ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src)
       target_link_libraries(${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample LINK_PUBLIC  ${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME} ${Boost_LIBRARIES} debug ${RTI_DRIVER_DEBUG_LIB} optimized ${RTI_DRIVER_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT})
       install(TARGETS ${PDS_ALTERNATE_OUTPUT_NAME}_sample DESTINATION bin)
    else()
       message(STATUS "Developer Studio: Sample will not be built since no sources available in ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} or ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src")
    endif()
endif()
